description: Integration into a development team to carry out the Bachelor's Thesis, working on a real project focused on developing an iOS mobile application to streamline the triage process during patient transport in ambulances:

sections.description: Collaborated within a multidisciplinary team in a professional environment, actively participating in all stages of the software development life cycle.
Utilized Swift (UIKit) and Apple's native technologies to design user interfaces via storyboards and managed dependencies using CocoaPods.
Applied the VIPER architecture pattern to ensure modularity, scalability, and maintainability of the codebase.
Followed agile methodologies using the SCRUM framework, with Jira and Confluence for task tracking and documentation.
Managed source control with GitFlow in GitLab, enabling efficient and structured collaboration.
